text:
In these difficult days, it's important that we care for one another. Glenglassaugh and our parent company Brown-Forman are pledging $1 million to support people impacted by COVID-19 in our industry and communities.
https://t.co/lJE9DtCBoV https://t.co/qJv4vmgyRr

To help prevent the spread of COVID-19 (Coronavirus), Glenglassaugh Distillery is temporarily closing the visitor centre beginning March 15, 2020. For questions please contact us here: https://t.co/hJeMPrcn5x https://t.co/o4ub7bye9z

We rely purely on the influence of the elements surrounding the distillery and the smaller Octave Cask type to give rolling waves of tropical fruit sweetness to #Glenglassaugh Octaves Batch 2 Classic. #scotch #singlemalt https://t.co/L1IEFZQQo9

As gentle waves slowly give shape to the rocks on our local Sandend Bay, we continue to craft small batches of our luscious coastal whisky, imbued with notes of tropical fruit sweetness. #glenglassaugh #scotch #singlemalt https://t.co/NJFVmv3O5J

The luscious sweetness of our full bodied coastal spirit is intensified in Glenglassaugh Pedro Ximénez Sherry Wood Finish. An ideal dram to sit back and enjoy over the festive season. #glenglassaugh #singlemalt #scotch https://t.co/T64RYcbCwl

Glenglassaugh Torfa brings together our local Highland peat from Northern Aberdeenshire with our coastal sweet spirit, offering spiced fruit notes ideal for the festive season. #glenglassaugh #singlemalt #scotch https://t.co/nR3KlY2d2M

While daylight time gets shorter at Glenglassaugh during the winter months, we still get the odd coastal sunset to enjoy on Sandend Bay. 
#Glenglassaugh #SingleMalt #Whisky https://t.co/gt942Jm5iW

With decades of coastal maturation, Glenglassaugh 30 year old takes on rich notes of tropical fruit, creating a luscious single malt.  
#Glenglassaugh #SingleMalt #Whisky https://t.co/68ZRF4NW7X

Glenglassaugh Octaves Batch 2 Peated uses smaller casks to harmonise salted caramel sweetness with a savory smoke spiced by the sea. 
#Glenglassaugh #SingleMalt #Whisky https://t.co/EIxlUZ9eht

Today we raise a dram in honour of our Master Blender Dr. Rachel Barrie (@TheLadyBlender) who has been inducted as a ‘Keeper of the Quaich’, celebrating her exceptional contribution to Scotch Whisky. 
Read More: https://t.co/FmAwS7tFQG
#KeeperOfTheQuaich #Glenglassaugh https://t.co/L8nhNoi0WH

With its natural summer gold hue and tropical fruit character, Glenglassaugh Evolution has successfully won gold at this year's International Wine and Spirits Competition @theIWSC. #whisky #iwsc 

To view all awards for Glenglassaugh at the IWSC 2019: https://t.co/gU4L6IHMxL https://t.co/QcYtQzwdL6
It's a peaceful time of year at Glenglassaugh as we take a break during the festive season. Enjoy the holidays with your friends and family. https://t.co/2GyoLTYY3g

Glenglassaugh Master Blender Rachel Barrie was inducted yesterday into The Whisky Magazine's Hall of Fame. This is the highest accolade The Whisky Magazine can bestow. Congratulations Rachel on an outstanding achievement! https://t.co/gpaLLCpmcx

We are proud to announce that Alan McConnochie, Distillery Manager for The GlenDronach, BenRiach and Glenglassaugh has been inducted as a Keeper of the Quaich, recognising and celebrating his exceptional contribution to the global success of Scotch Whisky. Congratulations Alan! https://t.co/7R8dybH7Fn

Introducing Glenglassaugh Octaves Batch 2: Classic and Peated. Composed of hand-selected small octave casks made to size from Bourbon, Sherry and Port casks. Greater interaction between oak wood and spirit gives rolling waves of flavour that intensify and evolve with every sip. https://t.co/Y4yQxc4SYJ

This year #IWSC has recognised Glenglassaugh 30 Years Old single malt whisky with a gold medal. We are so pleased of the accolade for our luscious Highland coastal malt that provides rolling waves of flavour. #awardwinning https://t.co/A8TAez1zuY

With newly awarded honour from #IWSC in 2018 Glenglassaugh continues for another year to celebrate our uniquely rich, lush, almost tropical coastal character which shines through. Silver medal for Glenglassaugh Evolution and Silver Outstanding medals for both Revival and Torfa. https://t.co/1Fiy3sniW1

Congratulations to our Master Blender Rachel Barrie whose expertise and service to the whisky industry was today recognised by the University of Edinburgh as she was made an honorary Doctor of Science; the first female Master Blender to do so.

Congratulations to our Master Blender Rachel Barrie whose expertise and service to the whisky industry was today recognised by the University of Edinburgh as she was made an honorary Doctor of Science; the first female Master Blender to do so. https://t.co/0GXBxiSG5b

Treat your dad this Father’s Day to a special single malt. Make it memorable with the elegance of Glenglassaugh’s 30 year old in a suitably stunning location. #glenglassaugh #singlemalt #whisky #sandendbay https://t.co/TmEgR1Nvs9

We are taking full advantage of the beautiful spring weather in Sanded Bay and celebrating World Whisky Day. Where is your favourite place to drink Glenglassaugh single malts? #WorldWhiskyDay #Glenglassaugh. #whisky https://t.co/HfHmpH9QBt

Congratulations to our very own Global Brand Ambassador Stewart Buchanan who has been named a ‘Keeper of the Quaich’. Only a small number of people receive this prestigious title for showing extraordinary dedication to and passion for Scotch Whisky. https://t.co/bsSVuNPyrh
If you are making your way to @WhiskyLive London this weekend be sure to stop by our stand and taste the Glenglassaugh  range, and we might just have a few more treats for you to try...

As quiet descends over the distillery, our casks continue to rest quietly in the cool sea air.  New discoveries await us in 2018.
We wish you a peaceful festive season, from all at Glenglassaugh. https://t.co/T7ohuerP5O
